column2: Which country do you currently reside in?
column3: Are you currently a student or are you employed? (cleaned)
column5: What stage of studying are you in?
column7: How many years of experience do you have?
column8: How big is your company/team (in persons)?
column9: How important is it for you to have a good GUI experience?
column10: How familiar are you with the term User-centred design (UCD) ?
column11: Have you ever worked on GUI projects or have been involved in the design process?
column12: What aspects are most important to you when designing an app?
column13: At what stage do you include users in the design process?
column14: How often do you involve testers in your design process?
column15: How do you collect user-feedback from testing into the design?
column16: Why do you consider user feedback?
column17: What are some barriers that you encounter implemented in user-centered design?
column18: How do you validate your GUI design?
column19: Do you think GUI design has improved, gotten worse or stayed the same in the last 3 years (since ChatGPT/AI Introduction)?
column20: In your user-centered design process, do you mainly gather feedback from real users, use AI assistance, or combine both?
column21: How often do users complain about compatibility or accessibility issues in your designs?
column22: To what extent do you consider accessibility (e.g., users with disabilities) in your design process?
